articles.title: National Meeting Marks Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Election as WPK General Secretary
articles.content:
National Meeting Marks Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Election as WPK General Secretary 
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- A national meeting took place at the April 25 House of Culture Sunday to mark the 15th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the WPK and first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, was present there.
					
					 Attending the meeting were senior party, state and army officials including Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim and Choe Ryong Hae, officials of the party, armed forces and power bodies, social organzaions, ministries and national institutions, service personnel of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, officials in the fields of science, education, literature and the arts and media, labor innovators and working people.
					
					 All the participants observed a moment's silence in memory of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Kim Ki Nam, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., the WPK, made a report.
					
					 The reporter said that Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the WPK was an epochal political event in the development of the WPK and accomplishment of the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 Kim Jong Il performed immortal feats before the party and the revolution, the country and the people with his outstanding idea and leadership, iron-willed courage and inexhaustible patriotic devotion while standing in the van of the WPK for half a century, he noted, and went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il was the gifted thinker and theoretician who indicated the road to be followed by the WPK and the revolution.
					
					 He formulated the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung as Kimilsungism and proclaimed the program of modeling whole society on Kimilsungism, and thus successfully realized the historic cause of clearly indicating the guiding idea and supreme program of the WPK.
					
					 He set forth the theory and leadership method in all fields including party, state and armed forces building and provided the encyclopedic guidelines with which the WPK could lead the revolution and construction to the correct road. 
					
					  Kim Jong Il developed the Juche idea and the Songun idea on a new level to significantly increase attraction and vitality of Kimilsungism and enrich the treasure house of human thinking. 
					
					 He was a prominent statesman and a great leader who developed the WPK into an ever-victorious one and created a new history of building a thriving socialist country.
					
					 He took it as a lifelong task to strengthen the WPK into the party of the President and saw to it that Kimilsungism was applied to party building and its activities, while adhering to the principle of building the Juche-oriented party.
					
					 Kim Jong Il formulated the Songun politics as a leadership mode of the WPK and developed it into headquarters of Songun revolution.
					
					 It is the greatest exploit of Kim Jong Il to shine in the history of the WPK that he built it into a revolutionary party that established steadfast ideological and leadership system of the leader, a mother party that formed a harmonious whole with the popular masses and served them and an invincible party with iron-like disciplines and high fighting efficiency.
					
					 Leading the WPK, Kim Jong Il demonstrated the dignity and might of Kim Il Sung's Korea and laid a foundation for building a thriving socialist country.
					
					 He oriented the party work towards implementation of the Songun revolutionary line to bolster the national defense capacity in every way.
					
					 He increased the party's role as a guide, ushering in golden days in building a thriving nation.
					
					 True to the behests of the President, Kim Jong Il formulated the Three Charters for National Reunification and provided the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 Declaration with his broad magnanimity, bringing about a turning point in the reunification movement that advances in the idea of By our nation itself.
					
					 Always preserving the independent stand and revolutionary principles, he steered the trend of the world policy to increase the external prestige of the WPK and the state, thereby making immortal contributions to accomplishing the cause of independence against imperialism and the cause of socialism.
					
					 His idea and cause of building the Juche-oriented party have successfully been carried forward by Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 Kim Jong Un opened up a new chapter in accomplishing the cause of perpetuating the memory of the leader to glorify Kim Jong Il's undying revolutionary life and exploits for all ages.
					
					 He also made sure that Kim Jong Il is held in high esteem as permanent general secretary of the WPK to develop it into a glorious party of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Thanks to his leadership, the WPK's prestige and might have remarkably increased and the people's support and trust in it have deepened.
					
					 The reporter called on all the officials and party members and other working people to firmly establish a monolithic leadership system of Kim Jong Un in the party and society and closely rally behind him.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Congratulates Putin on His Birthday
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Congratulates Putin on His Birthday
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, in a message on Sunday congratulated Russian President Vladimir Putin on his birthday.
					 Kim Jong Un in the message extended warm congratulations to Putin.
					
					 He said he was pleased over the fact that things have gone well in neighboring Russia under the leadership of Putin, expressing belief that the DPRK-Russia friendly and cooperative relations with a long historical tradition will continue to grow in different fields.
					
					 Kim Jong Un wished Putin greater success in his responsible work for building a powerful and modern Russia as well as good health and happiness.

articles.title: Choe Yong Rim Calls for Putting Production of Turf on Scientific Basis
articles.content:
Choe Yong Rim Calls for Putting Production of Turf on Scientific Basis
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- Premier Choe Yong Rim, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, made a field survey of the experimental farm for the production of turf at the turf institute of the State Academy of Sciences.
					 Looking round several experimental plots, the premier acquainted himself with the production of turf and scientific researches.
					
					 A field discussion was made on the issues of massively cultivating turf seeds by directing primary efforts into scientific researches, fixing the right time according to species and temperature records and putting the methods of planting turf on a scientific basis in line with the mission of the institute.
					
					 To green the whole country as intended by the party is a patriotic work of a lasting value in sprucing up the country, the premier said, organizing economic work for turning the experimental station into a more excellent one.
					
					 The premier learned about the technological characteristics and economic efficiency of the farm machines made by the institute of agricultural mechanization under the Academy of Agricultural Science.
					
					 At a consultative meeting, measures were taken for meeting the requirements of designs in manufacturing farm machinery and laying a solid material and technological foundation of the institute.
					
					 Earlier, the premier dropped in at a base of producing phone apparatus to discuss the issue of putting the communications on a modern and IT basis.

articles.title: Singaporean Delegation Visits Statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
Singaporean Foreign Ministry Delegation Visits Several Places
articles.content:
Singaporean Foreign Ministry Delegation Visits Several Places
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Singapore led by Permanent Secretary Bilahari Kausikan visited the National Gifts Exhibition House.
					 The visitors saw with keen interest gifts presented to the great persons of Mt. Paektu by the people of the DPRK and overseas and south Korean people.
					
					 The delegation toured the Tower of the Juche Idea, Korean Art Gallery, Taedonggang Tile Factory and the Pyongyang Folk Park.

articles.title: Average of 2,000 People Visit Party Founding Memorial Tower on Daily Basis
articles.content:
2,000 People Visit Party Founding Memorial Tower on Daily Average
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- The visitors to the Party Founding Memorial Tower numbered 4.76 million for the past 15 years.
					 In the year of Kim Jong Il's election as WPK general secretary in 1997, more than 410,000 people visited the tower, deeply cherishing his undying feats for the strengthening of the party.
					
					In October every year, the number of visitors average 25,000.
					
					 This October, more than 2,000 of over 40 units toured the tower on a daily average.
					
					 A great number of overseas Koreans and even foreigners heaped praises on Kim Jong Il after visiting the tower.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Underlines Importance of Strengthening International Friendship
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Underlines Importance of Strengthening International Friendship
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- The world progressives should promote the development of international friendly and cooperative relations based on the respect for sovereignty and thus make contributions to building an independent and peaceful world, says Rodong Sinmun Sunday in a bylined article.
					 To accomplish the cause of global independence is a unanimous desire of mankind, says the article, adding:
					
					 In the independent world, people are free from all kinds of domination, subjugation, interference and pressure as well as aggression and war.
					
					 The global independence can not be achieved without the friendship among the countries and nations around the world.
					
					 Only when all the countries support and solidarize with each other on the principles of independence, equality, mutual respect and noninterference in internal affairs, is it possible to make friendship among them a genuine and stable one.
					
					 To strengthen the friendly relations among countries and peoples aspiring after independence is a requirement of the present international situation.
					
					 The international relations today are developing towards multi-polarization.
					
					 The imperialists have tried to turn the world into a unipolar world swayed over by their highhanded and arbitrary practices and unilateralism.
					
					 Given the facts, when all the countries and peoples aspiring after independence strengthen genuine international friendship by supporting and cooperating with each other, they can foil the imperialist aggression forces' domination and achieve national prosperity and development.
					
					 The DPRK will as ever form and develop the good neighborly relations of friendship and cooperation with all other countries that respect its sovereignty and are friendly to it. By doing so, it will make great contributions to frustrating the imperialists' policy of war and domination, defending peace and realizing independence of the world.

articles.title: Treacherous Five Years of Lee Myung Bak Regime under Fire
articles.content:
Treacherous Five Years of Lee Myung Bak Regime under Fire
Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet newspaper Thongil News on Thursday carried the article titled "Five Years of Lee Myung Bak Regime, Failed Policy toward DPRK" condemning the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors for plunging the north-south relations into a complete deadlock.
					 The article said the Lee Myung Bak regime, which drew public criticism at the early days of its seizure of power, has paid no heed to the south-north cooperation.
					
					 The regime disrupted the economic cooperative work that had promoted the reconciliation, cooperation and trust between the south and the north. Not content with this, it totally stopped all exchanges with the north by taking "May 24 step" under the pretext of the "Cheonan" case, said the article.
					
					 The regime rashly imputed the responsibility for the case to the north and unilaterally declared confrontation with it, an insensible act, according to the article.
					
					 The article branded the five years of the Lee Myung Bak regime's seizure of power as years of betrayal which resulted in laying a hurdle in the way for the national prosperity.
					
					 The nation should pool efforts and cooperate with each other instead of inciting confrontation, the article said, adding the Lee regime's confrontation history will surely be called to account.
					
					 The article called upon the nation to turn out for the implementation of the October 4 declaration for the earlier rebuilding of the south-north ties.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Urges Authorities to Opt for Implementation of October 4 Declaration
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Urges Authorities to Opt for Implementation of October 4 Declaration
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Democracy, People's Life, Peaceful Reunification and Sovereignty of south Korea held a press conference on October 4 on the occasion of the fifth anniversary of the historic October 4 declaration.
					 The organization said that it greeted the significant anniversary of the October 4 declaration, practical programme for implementing the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 The October 4 declaration which enjoyed warm support and appraisal by all the Koreans serves as the reunification programme which correctly indicates the road of the reunification to be followed by the compatriots, it noted. 
					
					 Nevertheless, the Lee Myung Bak "government" totally denied the joint declarations, deteriorated the south-north relations and cut off the exchange and cooperation for the past five years of its office, while extremely escalating the confrontation with compatriots and creating the danger of a war.
					
					 The present regime has pushed the situation to the brink of a war while firing bullets and shells in the West Sea of Korea.
					
					 If the October 4 declaration had been sincerely implemented, such military danger would not have been created.
					
					 The organization urged the authorities to opt to implement the October 4 declaration, though belatedly.
					
					 The implementation of the October 4 declaration guarantees peace, reunification and prosperity on the Korean Peninsula, it noted, calling upon all the progressive forces to pool their efforts to oppose the authorities' moves for igniting a war and to usher in a new era of reunification and prosperity.

articles.title: Compatriots in Osaka Meet to Mark Anniversary of October 4 Declaration
articles.content:
Compatriots in Osaka Meet to Mark Anniversary of October 4 Declaration
Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- A meeting of compatriots in Osaka was held at a center of Japan on October 3 on the occasion of the fifth anniversary of the historic October 4 declaration.
					 Present there were members of the Osaka Headquarters of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), the Osaka Headquarters of the Federation of South Koreans in Japan for Democracy and Unification, the Japan's Regional Committee of the Overseas Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration and the Association of Koreans in Japan for Peaceful Reunification and other compatriots in Japan.
					
					 The speakers said at the meeting that they once again came to realize the significance of the June 15 joint declaration and its practical programme October 4 declaration provided by General  Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The adoption of the north-south joint declarations was the nation's historic event that hardened the compatriots' faith and added to their optimism about the reunification and put the independent reunification movement on a higher stage, they noted, and went on:
					
					 However, the agreements between the north and the south have been undermined and the military tension has prevailed on the Korean Peninsula since the Lee Myung Bak regime seized the power in south Korea.
					
					 The conservative regime seeking to hinder the reunification should not be allowed to take power in south Korea.
					
					 Only when all the Koreans make efforts, can the desire for the national reunification come true. The Koreans in Japan should turn out as one in the efforts for achieving the country's reunification and especially the rising generation should take the lead in it.
					
					 A joint appeal of the June 15 All-Korean Committee to all the compatriots was read out.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats for Party Building Praised abroad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats for Party Building Praised Abroad
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- Seminars on undying feats of General Secretary Kim Jong Il in party building were held in Nepal, Nigeria and Uganda from Sept. 20 to 29 on the occasion of the 15th anniversary of Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and its 67th founding anniversary.
					 C.P.Mainali, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Nepal Communist Party (Marxist-Leninist), said that Kim Jong Il developed the WPK into an invincible revolutionary party, party of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 All Korean people hold him as eternal general secretary of the WPK, Mainali noted, and went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il pursued the Songun politics, making sure that the DPRK legitimately ranked itself among nuclear weapons states.
					
					 The WPK which was founded by Kim Il Sung and developed by Kim Jong Il will always win victory as it is led by the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Igwanagu Nicholas, chairman of the Nigerian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, said:
					
					 What is important among Kim Jong Il's exploits of party building is that he built it into an ideologically transparent integral whole and a party which realized unbreakable cohesion and unity as well as a genuine mother party serving the people.
					
					 The chairman of the Kampala City Committee of the Uganda National Resistance Movement, highly praised Kim Jong Il for his feats of developing the WPK into an ever-victorious party.
					
					 A message of greeting to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the seminar held in Nepal.

articles.title: Bulgarian Organization Marks WPK Anniversary
articles.content:
Bulgarian Organization Marks WPK Anniversary
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- The Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association made public the 8th issue of its bulletin on Sept. 28 on the occasion of the 67th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The bulletin carried articles under various titles illustrated with a portrait of a smiling President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 In the article titled "67th anniversary of the WPK" the bulletin introduced the fact that the WPK founded by Kim Il Sung has developed into an invincible revolutionary party fully supported by broad masses.
					
					 The article titled "Mass gymnastic and art performance 'Arirang'" said:
					
					 The dear respected Kim Jong Un enjoyed the performance with Pyongyang citizens on Sept. 16.
					
					 The performance impressively showed the past and present of Juche Korea which put an end to the national history full of ups and downs and put its dignity on the highest level as it was led by the outstanding leader. The performance also truthfully depicted the future of eternal prosperity of the DPRK.
					
					 The bulletin introduced in detail the fact that the People's Theater has been built in the DPRK as a grand edifice in the era of Songun. Triplets born in the DPRK are growing up under the care of the WPK and state, enjoying all blessings, the bulletin added.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Bulgaria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Bulgaria
Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- The Slavina Publishing House in Bulgaria published in booklet on October 1 General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "Our Socialism Centered on the Masses Shall not Perish."
					 The work made public on May 5, 1991 clarifies the certainty of the socialist victory, the solidity of the socialism of the DPRK, the key to its invincibility, its essential characteristic, etc.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Carried by German Paper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Carried by German Paper
Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- The German newspaper Rote Fahne carried the gist of leader Kim Jong Un's work "The Great Comrade Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and People" on October 1.
					 The work made public on April 20, 2012 clarifies the revolutionary careers of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It indicates the tasks for firmly defending and boundlessly glorifying their idea and exploits.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre recien erguida estatua de bronce de Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre recien erguida estatua de bronce de Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, 7 de octubre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un recorrio la estatua de bronce del gran Dirigente, Generalisimo Kim Jong Il erguida en el Ministerio de Seguridad Estatal.
					El Mariscal fue acogido en el terreno por el general de ejercito del Ejercito Popular de Corea, Kim Won Hong, ministro de Seguridad Estatal, el coronel general del EPC, Kim Chang Sop, jefe de la Direccion Politica y otros miembros de mando de la misma cartera.
					
					Junto con dichos miembros directivos, el rindio postumo homenaje al Generalisimo Kim Jong Il ante su estatua de bronce que reproduce la imagen con amplia sonrisa del Generalisimo, vestido en abrigo de campana, que transmite todos los hechos de la revolucion del Songun, y con una mano puesta en la cintura, llamando a todo el ejercito y pueblo a la victoria final y bendiciendo el futuro de la potencia del monte Paektu.
					
					El Mariscal dijo que han descrito muy bien la estatua de bronce y agrego en tono emocionante que el aspecto del Generalisimo vestido en abrigo de campana y puesto espejuelos es tan vivido que le parecia encontrarse con el Dirigente a quien veian tanto todos los militares y civiles.
					
					Destaco que la construccion de la estatua de bronce del Dirigente en el Ministerio de Seguridad Estatal es una muestra patente de la conviccion inmueble de todos los soldados de seguridad de defender generacion tras generacion el cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria del Juche.
					
					Kim Jong Un departio con los integrantes de mando del citado ministerio ante la estatua de bronce.
					
					Asevero que es muy importante la mision del Ministerio de Seguridad Estatal para mantener la soberania del pais y la nacion y subrayo que todos los soldados de seguridad deben tener presente de su mision de combate orgullosa pero pesada.
					
					Destaco que los soldados de seguridad deben ser valientes como ferias en el combate invisible con los enemigos.
					
					Aun en medio de cualesquier tempestades, los soldados de seguridad deben apoyar hasta el final al PTC, acoto y apunto la necesidad de guardar en el corazon la voluntad ferrea parecida al oro puro que no se quema en las llamas.
					
					Hay que vigilar agudamente las maniobras de los enemigos, librar el combate tenaz por frustrar la penetracion ideo-cultural y el complot psicologico y continuar impulsando con vigor en alto nivel la modernizacion e informatizacion de la labor de seguridad estatal.
					
					Expreso la esperanza de que todos los miembros del Ministerio de Seguridad Estatal pondran de manifiesto la voluntad de desafiar la muerte y la valentia incomparable y cumplir con su honrosa obligacion en el camino para frustrar  tajantemente las maniobras de los imperialistas y otros reaccionarios tendentes a aplastar a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, y se fotografio junto a los miembros directivos ante la estatua de bronce del Dirigente.
					
					Le acompano el submariscal del EPC, Choe Ryong Hae, jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre parques de atracciones reconstruidos
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre parques de atracciones reconstruidos
Pyongyang, 7 de octubre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un recorrio los Parques de Atracciones de Mangyongdae y de Taesongsan, reconstruidos magnificamente conforme a la demanda de la epoca de Songun.
					El mariscal fue acogido por los miembros directivos de las grandes unidades combinadas 526 y 966 del Ejercito Popular de Corea participantes en la reconstruccion y reparacion de dichos parques de atracciones.
					
					Ante todo, el Mariscal estuvo en el Parque de Atracciones de Mangyongdae.
					
					En el parque de primera etapa, expreso su gran satisfaccion de que los oficiales y soldados del EPC hayan reconstruido y reparado bien todas las instalaciones de atracciones y edificios de servicio publico conforme al requisito de nuevo siglo.
					
					En la sala de disparo de fusiles de rayos dijo que la sala fue transformada completamente que antes, diciendo que en mayo pasado era lamentable, y elogio que tambien los nuevos equipos y materiales de atracciones de fusiles de rayos convienen a la psicologia infantil.
					
					Al pasar por la piscina de recreo, recorrio el vestuario y la cancha de voleibol de playa mostrandose alegre de que estos hayan sido renovados en nuevos tipos y miro con satisfaccion la piscina de agua corriente, la de oleadas y la otra con tobogan, reconstruidos y reparados magnificamente para que no se distinguiera su aspecto anterior.
					
					Paseando por el recinto del parque de segunda etapa se mostro satisfecho de que se hayan armonizado bien las modernas instalaciones de atracciones, los edificios reconstruidos, las carreteras y aceras nuevamente adornadas con los hermosos paisajes de contornos.
					
					 Hizo funcionar el tren de montana de doble giro y otros aparatos de atracciones para cerciorarse de la seguridad y averiguo en detalles las caracteristicas de varios equipos concernientes en la sala de diversion.
					
					El Mariscal dijo que estuvo muy satisfecho por la reconstruccion del Parque de Atracciones de Mangyongdae y subrayo que los uniformados del EPC han mostrado vigorosamente el poderio del ejercito revolucionarios a traves de la reconstruccion de ese parque conforme a los requisitos de la epoca de Songun.
					
					Acto seguido, Kim Jong Un visito el Parque de Atracciones de Taesongsan.
					
					Entrando en el recinto del parque por la entrada construida especificamente, el Mariscal miro con atencion las manzanas del parque caminando por las aceras de asfalto y las condecoradas con bloques de color.
					
					Aunque he elogiado a los oficiales y soldados del EPC acabando de recorrer el Parque de Atracciones de Mangyongdae, ellos hacen alarde del poderio del potente ejercito revolucionario que no sabe imposibilidad en las importantes zonas para la construccion de potencia economica y la mejora de la vida del pueblo, asevero.
					
					Expreso la alegria de que hayan reconstruido originalmente la noria gigante, la nave espacial y otras facilidades de atracciones y reparado los establecimientos de servicio publico.
					
					En el Restaurante Nammun, reconstruido completamente en el recinto del parque donde se armonizan bien los arboles, las flores y los cespedes de buenas especies, el Mariscal miro con atencion las mesas y sillas hechas con granito y se entero del plan de servicio.
					
					Acentuo que normalizar la gestion de los citados parques recorridos es una labor importante para hacer brillar las hazanas de direccion del Presidente Kim Il Sung y del Dirigente Kim Jong Il y brindar al pueblo coreano las mejores condiciones de descanso cultural.
					
					Manifesto la esperanza y conviccion de que los oficiales y soldados de las grandes unidades combinadas participantes en la reconstruccion y reparacion de dichos parques haran muchos trabajos para el pueblo y cumpliran con el deber del ejercito del pueblo.
					
					En la ocasion el Mariscal fue acompanado por el submariscal del EPC, Choe Ryong Hae, jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC.
